title: 14: S5E14 – "Beneath the Surface" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you five terrifying tales from authors Chris Bertman, N.M. Brown, Brandon Wills, CreepyCarbs, and Shannon Higdon, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about suspicious scents, ritual resuscitation, ravenous revenants, paranormal playmates, and perilous pets.


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
